meanings.sent1: The squintier cat blinked in the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She put on her squintier glasses to read the small print.
meanings.sent3: The squintier squirrel tried to read a tiny book with tiny letters.
meanings.sent4: His squintier eyes saw through the disguise and recognized the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The squintier stars in the sky seemed to wink at the curious child.

meanings.definition: More inclined to squint than something else
meanings.sent1: The squintier child struggled to see the distant sign.
meanings.sent2: Her squintier gaze revealed her suspicion of the stranger.
meanings.sent3: The squintier puppy tried to imitate its owner's serious expression.
meanings.sent4: The squintier detective noticed the subtle clue others missed.
meanings.sent5: The squintier road seemed to disappear in the foggy distance.
